attributes.action: Sadiq Khan sacked. He’s know good for London of Britain
attributes.additional_details: We the British people, don’t want Sadiq Khan running London. And we are sick of him speaking for us. All lies and this  petition will prove it
attributes.background: We the real British people want Sadiq Khan sacked

rejection.details: The Mayor of London is elected by the people of London, not appointed by the UK Government or Parliament.
